name: Feel Good
body:
**V3.0** _- in Progress_
Renamed to Feel Good (sounds better). This would enable more messages to come up randomly.


**V2.0**
Renamed the App to Praise Yourself. Made to make people feel better. This is an upgrade from the tutorial. You need to put in your name, click send, and a message will pop up. Intended to make more messages, but I faced some trouble of immutable String in the development.

Screenshots:


**V1.0**
I followed the Android tutorial for the first app to send message to the screen.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
